resources.string: Welcome to Aberystwyth Conference 2019. This app is designed to help you know what is happening over the duration of the conference. Take a look at our different tabs below and get a feel for the conference. We hope you have a nice time in Aberystwyth.

This is a list of events that are happening. Click on each item to get more details or to add to your favourite.
Adding this event to your favourites will make it available to be viewed in the \'Favourites\' tab
Your favourite are listed here. Click on your favourite to find more information or remove them.
